EmailTemplate.description: US-0011680 - New Status "PO Review" to User Stories Object and notification
EmailTemplate.name: PO Review Template
EmailTemplate.subject: User Story {!copado__User_Story__c.copado__User_Story_Title__c} requires your review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!copado__User_Story__c.OwnerFullName},
The user story {!copado__User_Story__c.copado__User_Story_Title__c} requires your review.
Please review the story with the regional Business Analyst and provide timely feedback.
Thank you,
HIVE.
